alert.note: Alert for Blount; Cherokee; Etowah; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:50PM CDT until August 07 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Blount County in central Alabama... Etowah County in northeastern Alabama... Northern St. Clair County in central Alabama... Cherokee County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 250 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Little River Canyon National Preserve to near Bangor, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Rainbow City, Oneonta, Attalla, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, Springville, Odenville, Centre, Cedar Bluff, Little River Canyon National Preserve, Forney, Centre Municipal Airport, Glencoe, Margaret, Argo, Ashville, Sardis City, Ragland and Locust Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
